altername_name: New 3D Golf Simulation: Pebble Beach no Hatou
New 3D Golf Simulation: Pebble Beach no Hatō
name: Pebble Beach Golf Links
overview: Eighteen of the most dramatic and toughest holes in golf. Five exciting golfing options: Practice, Stroke Play, Skins Game, Match Play, and Tournament Play versus 48 top golfers. In-depth Golf features: Caddie Advice, Instant Replays, Complete Shot, Leader Board, and Hole Fly-bys.
